rule.ruleDesc: Notification is triggered when request is Escalated
rule.condition: escalated in $L.file=true and not (same(escalated in $L.file.save, true)) and not (same(contact.name in $L.file.owner.contacts.contact.name, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Escalated in CurrentRecord = true AND Escalated in SavedRecord != true AND Contact Name in Request Manager in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="crosstablefield"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Request Manager">owner</FieldName><relation><TargetTable Caption="contacts">contacts</TargetTable><TargetField caption="contact.name">contact.name</TargetField><FieldName caption="Contact Name">contact.name</FieldName></relation></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: [Notification is triggered when request is Escalated (when ( Escalated in CurrentRecord = true AND Escalated in SavedRecord != true AND Contact Name in Request Manager in CurrentRecord != NULL))]

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: RM Escalated to Request Manager
rule.conditionDesc: ( Contact Name in Request Manager in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="crosstablefield"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Request Manager">owner</FieldName><relation><TargetTable Caption="contacts">contacts</TargetTable><TargetField caption="contact.name">contact.name</TargetField><FieldName caption="Contact Name">contact.name</FieldName></relation></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: RM Escalated to Request Manager (when ( Contact Name in Request Manager in CurrentRecord != NULL))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: RM Escalated to Assignee
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: RM Escalated to Assignee (when ( assigned.to in CurrentRecord != NULL))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: RM Escalated to Assignment Group
rule.condition: same(assigned.to in $L.file, NULL) and not (same(assigned.group in $L.file, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( assigned.to in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assigned.group in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assigned to">assigned.to</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assigned Group">assigned.group</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: - Send HTML Email: RM Escalated to Assignment Group (when ( assigned.to in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assigned.group in CurrentRecord != NULL))
